extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: 25 contrasts from 22 publications reported GM decreases among individuals with and without PTSD (i.e., non-PTSD > PTSD). Sample sizes are provided for the total number of participants (N) (i.e., PTSD and non-PTSD), as well as the sample sizes for the PTSD groups (n)
